headers.socials: You can also find me here:

paragraphs.aboutMe: Hello, I'm a software developer and applied computer science student based in Poland! I love learning new stuff and using acquired knowledge in practice - either for solo or group projects. I believe that code readability and clean architecture are crucial for implementing a scalable solution.
paragraphs.aboutMe2: I consider myself to be well organised, responsible and meticulous. I am comfortable with demanding tasks that require planning and supervising their progress.
paragraphs.aboutMe3: As for my professional life, I aim to become a more capable developer every day. I want to combine technical knowledge with soft skills to solve any task with ease!

hobbies.games: I love playing and making games!
hobbies.gym: I believe physical and mental development are equally important.
hobbies.music: My favorite music genres are rock and pop.

skills.vsCode: My favorite code editor for most programming languages :)
skills.intellij: I use it all the time for Java coding.
skills.visualStudio: Mostly using it with Unity for gamedev. But I have implemented some C++ apps in it and it works great!
skills.linux: I can work in linux environment without a problem.
skills.cmake: I know how to setup and configure a cmake project and that's about it :)
skills.docker: My computer hates docker so I hardly ever use it. But I have some experience from work.
skills.godot: I know Godot pretty well, though I have only made 2D games with it.
